title: nbdev_tutorial
text: This file will become your README and also the index of your documentation.

title: nbdev_tutorial
text:
How to use
This lib provides a Card class you can use to create, display and compare cards

Card(1,3)

3 diamond

title: card
text:
Equality, less than and greater than work on the rank and suit indices

source



 Card (suit:int, rank:int)

A playing card




Type
Details




suit
int
An index into suits


rank
int
An index into ranks




test

<function fastcore.test.test(a, b, cmp, cname=None)>



test_eq(Card(suit=1, rank=3), Card(suit=1, rank=3))
test_ne(Card(suit=2, rank=3), Card(suit=1, rank=3))
assert Card(suit=1, rank=4) < Card(suit=1, rank=5)
assert Card(suit=1, rank=5) > Card(suit=1, rank=4)
